name: @openacr/openacr
description: OpenACR schema validator and output generator

scripts.generate-example-output: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f tests/examples/valid.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o tests/examples/valid.markdown
scripts.generate-drupal-output: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f openacr/drupal-9.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.1-508-en.yaml -o openacr/drupal-9.markdown
scripts.generate-example-html: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f tests/examples/valid.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o tests/examples/valid.html
scripts.generate-drupal-html: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f openacr/drupal-9.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.1-508-en.yaml -o openacr/drupal-9.html
scripts.generate-drupal-simple: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f openacr/drupal-9.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.1-508-en.yaml -o openacr/drupal-9-simple.html -t templates/openacr-simple-html-0.1.0.handlebars
scripts.generate-drupal-10-html: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f openacr/drupal-10-15.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.1-en.yaml -o openacr/drupal-10-15.html
scripts.generate-drupal-10-simple: npx ts-node src/openacr.ts output -f openacr/drupal-10-15.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.1-en.yaml -o openacr/drupal-10-15-simple.html -t templates/openacr-simple-html-0.1.0.handlebars
